meanings.definition: The act of breaking into a building illegally to steal.
meanings.sent1: Burglaries can lead to serious consequences.
meanings.sent2: The police are investigating a series of burglaries in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The burglaries in the movie were so unrealistic, they made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The rise in burglaries is like a dark cloud hanging over the city.
meanings.sent5: The news report about the burglaries was so vivid, it felt like I was there.
